Docs.summary: The ISO date formatter that formats or parses a date without an offset, such as '20111203'.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Gets the DecimalStyle to be used during formatting.
Docs.value: the locale of this formatter, not null

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The ISO date formatter that formats or parses a date with the offset if available, such as '2011-12-03' or '2011-12-03+01:00'.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The ISO-like date-time formatter that formats or parses a date-time with the offset and zone if available, such as '2011-12-03T10:15:30', '2011-12-03T10:15:30+01:00' or '2011-12-03T10:15:30+01:00[Europe/Paris]'.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The ISO instant formatter that formats or parses an instant in UTC, such as '2011-12-03T10:15:30Z'.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The ISO date formatter that formats or parses a date without an offset, such as '2011-12-03'.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The ISO date-time formatter that formats or parses a date-time without an offset, such as '2011-12-03T10:15:30'.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The ISO time formatter that formats or parses a time without an offset, such as '10:15' or '10:15:30'.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The ISO date formatter that formats or parses a date with an offset, such as '2011-12-03+01:00'.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The ISO date-time formatter that formats or parses a date-time with an offset, such as '2011-12-03T10:15:30+01:00'.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The ISO time formatter that formats or parses a time with an offset, such as '10:15+01:00' or '10:15:30+01:00'.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The ISO date formatter that formats or parses the ordinal date without an offset, such as '2012-337'.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The ISO time formatter that formats or parses a time, with the offset if available, such as '10:15', '10:15:30' or '10:15:30+01:00'.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The ISO date formatter that formats or parses the week-based date without an offset, such as '2012-W48-6'.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The ISO-like date-time formatter that formats or parses a date-time with offset and zone, such as '2011-12-03T10:15:30+01:00[Europe/Paris]'.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.value: the locale of this formatter, not null
